TopicTitle: (RO RP-0) No AeroFX (reentry flames/mach effects) whatsoever despite the setting is on Normal.

Articles.Content:
So I have run into one of the most interesting of problems, after setting up a install directory for Realism Overhaul (with Real Progression Zero) KSP for Windows 32bit. It seems the entire mach effects and reentry heating are devoid even on normal setting, heating still works but no mach effects, can anyone help solve this mysterious issue?

Some other information:

Used CKAN to install the RO suite.

EDIT: Well the problem has been solved. Don't know what it was.

Edited September 4, 2015 by TheRag
Self-Solution.

When you go to edit, you can click "go advanced" and then edit the prefix to solved.

Glad it's solved--if you ever do figure out why, let me know!
Give me a few days, I probably can reproduce it. Right now I am working on some Heat Shield related things, convection fluxes are near zero...yippie.
